price: 116. (Xus) markaan ku nidhi malaa’igta: U sujuuda (salaan ahaan) Aadam, wayna sujuudeen (dhammaan) Ibliis maahee, wuu diiday.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قُلۡنَا لِلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ ٱسۡجُدُواْ لِأٓدَمَ فَسَجَدُوٓاْ إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ أَبَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qul'nā lil'malāikati us'judū liādama fasajadū illā ib'līsa abā
